     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "import orcs.core\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as pl\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import scipy.fft"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "acbd4be6-3051-4780-ab3a-79f7b4c70cdc",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stderr",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "\u001b[0mdev.0624|INFO| CFHT version\u001b[0m\n",
      "\u001b[0mdev.0624|INFO| Cube is level 2.5\u001b[0m\n",
      "\u001b[0mdev.0624|INFO| shape: (2048, 2064, 847)\u001b[0m\n",
      "\u001b[0mdev.0624|INFO| wavenumber calibration: True\u001b[0m\n",
      "\u001b[0mdev.0624|INFO| flux calibration: True\u001b[0m\n",
      "\u001b[0mdev.0624|INFO| wcs calibration: True\u001b[0m\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "cube = orcs.core.SpectralCube('data/M1_2022_SN3.merged.cm1.hdf5')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "f8896551-a4dd-4341-b0bf-51ba2d6cd6c6",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## reduce the resolution of a spectrum"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "id": "6f693c23-75e6-4ae6-bfa6-e499898f53e7",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# reduce the resolution of a spectrum by half\n",
    "\n",
    "REDUCTION = 0.5\n",
    "\n",
    "spec = cube.get_spectrum(1000,1000)\n",
    "spec.plot()\n",
    "\n",
    "# inverse transform\n",
    "zp_spec = np.concatenate([spec.data, spec.data[::-1]])\n",
    "spec_ifft = scipy.fft.ifft(zp_spec)\n",
    "spec_ifft = np.roll(spec_ifft, spec.data.size)\n",
    "\n",
    "# apply window to reduce resolution\n",
    "w = np.zeros(spec_ifft.size, dtype=float)\n",
    "ncut = int(REDUCTION / 2 * spec_ifft.size) # remove half data (2*0.25, on each side)\n",
    "\n",
    "w[spec.params.zpd_index + ncut:-(ncut + spec.params.zpd_index)] = 1\n",
    "spec_ifft *= w\n",
    "spec_ifft = np.roll(spec_ifft, -spec.data.size)\n",
    "\n",
    "# forward transform\n",
    "spec.data = scipy.fft.fft(spec_ifft)[:spec.dimx]\n",
    "\n",
    "spec.plot()\n",
    "pl.grid()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "id": "ab17aad2-63df-4946-8403-1f735ed84775",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": []
  }
 ],
